trans-unit.source: Describes a two-dimensional rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 描述一个二维的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> class, and creates a rectangle with zero area.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>类，并创建具有零个区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> class and specifies its dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>类并指定其尺寸。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> structure with the rectangle's dimensions.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>结构具有矩形的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> structure with the rectangle's dimensions.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>结构具有矩形的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the rounded corner where it connects with the upper and lower edges of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 在此处连接的矩形的边缘和下边缘圆角的半径。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the rounded corner where it connects with the left and right edges of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 在此处连接左边缘和右边缘的矩形的圆角的半径。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> structure with the rectangle's dimensions.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>结构具有矩形的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the rounded corner where it connects with the upper and lower edges of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 在此处连接的矩形的边缘和下边缘圆角的半径。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the rounded corner where it connects with the left and right edges of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 在此处连接左边缘和右边缘的矩形的圆角的半径。

trans-unit.source: The transformation to apply to the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于该几何图形的转换。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the bounding box of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> ，它指定的边界框<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method does not take any pens into account.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会考虑任何钢笔。

trans-unit.source: If animations are present, the base values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry> object are used to calculate the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在动画的基值<xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry>对象用于计算边界框。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry>

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 边界框<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of the filled region of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取的填充区域的区域<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The computational tolerance of error.
trans-unit.target: 计算的容错。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the error tolerance will be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 指定将如何解释错误容差。

trans-unit.source: The area of the filled region of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 填充区域的区域<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>对象为空。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> is empty; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>空; 否则为**false**。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>对象可能具有曲线段。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry"></xref>对象可能具有曲线段; 否则为**false**。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-radius of the ellipse use to round the corners of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置椭圆用于圆角化矩形角的 x 轴半径。

trans-unit.source: For the rectangle to have rounded corners, both the RadiusX and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusY%2A> properties must be non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 若要有了圆形角，这两个 RadiusX 使矩形和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusY%2A>属性必须为非零。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusY%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value greater than or equal to zero and less than or equal to half the rectangle's width that describes the x-radius of the ellipse use to round the corners of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 一个值大于或等于零且小于或等于矩形宽度的一半描述椭圆的 x 半径，用于圆角化矩形角。

trans-unit.source: Values greater than half the rectangle's width are treated as though equal to half the rectangle's width.
trans-unit.target: 大于矩形宽度的一半的值将被视为好像等于矩形宽度的一半。

trans-unit.source: Negative values are treated as positive values.
trans-unit.target: 负值被视为正值。

trans-unit.source: The default is `0.0`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`0.0`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusX*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusX*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusX*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-radius of the ellipse use to round the corners of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置椭圆用于圆角化矩形角的 y 轴半径。

trans-unit.source: For the rectangle to have rounded corners, both the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusX%2A> and RadiusY properties must be non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 若要有了圆形角，使矩形同时<xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusX%2A>和 RadiusY 属性必须为非零。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusX%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value greater than or equal to zero and less than or equal to half the rectangle's width that describes the y-radius of the ellipse use to round the corners of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 一个值大于或等于零且小于或等于矩形宽度的一半描述椭圆 y 轴半径用于圆角化矩形角。

trans-unit.source: Values greater than half the rectangle's width are treated as though equal to half the rectangle's width.
trans-unit.target: 大于矩形宽度的一半的值将被视为好像等于矩形宽度的一半。

trans-unit.source: Negative values are treated as positive values.
trans-unit.target: 负值被视为正值。

trans-unit.source: The default is `0.0`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`0.0`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusY*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusY*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.RadiusY*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the dimensions of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置矩形的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The position and size of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 位置和矩形的大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>。</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.Rect*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.Rect*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RectangleGeometry.Rect*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
